bibl.title: Letter from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, [circa September 13, 1898]

div1.p: Lazear discusses his travel plans. He reports that Martha Houston is sorry Sweitzer didn't visit.

div1.head: Letter from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, [circa September 13, 1898]
div1.p:
Your letter
reached me yesterday after-
noon. We came down
from Yarmouth this
morning by the early
train. We shall start
for N.Y. tomorrow
morning and will probably
reach the Bayard late
in the afternoon.

Mrs. Houston sends her love and is
sorry you are not coming.

She now expects to come down
to Boston on Saturday.

Jennie is looking very well.
They have a very pretty place
here.
